description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documents and bid submission must be submitted by May 28, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: during the goverment rating or it`s supressede
full_summary:
**
Government Tender Announcement
----------

**Tender Title and Reference Number**

* English: Solar Powered Crosswalk Flashers
* French: Feux clignotants à énergie solaire pour passage piétonnier
* Reference Number: WS4326739374-Doc4577446219

**Solicitation Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS4326739374
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: May 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 28, 2024 (14:00:00)
* Expected Start Date: None
* Expected End Date: None

**Contract Details**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)

**Contracting Entity Information**

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity Information**

* Name: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**

* Name: Stanley Chui (PSPC/SPAC)
* Email: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**

* This RFP seeks proposals for the supply of solar powered crosswalk flashers for use by the Department of National Defence (DND).
* Please note that the closing time for bid submissions has been amended to 14:00:00 on May 28, 2024.

**Access to Tender Documents**

* The complete tender package, including the RFP and terms and conditions, can be accessed via Ariba Discovery at the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19654578](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19654578)

Note: I removed all unnecessary items and reorganized to priority. Let me know if this is what you were looking for.  



Best regards,
[Your Name],
